settings.text: Two ways to get your Apple device repaired: we collect it from anywhere in the UK, or you visit us in Central London. Same expertise, same process, same warranty.

settings.heading: How do I book a repair?
settings.sub_head: Select your device, choose your repair, and pick a time. Courier or walk-in. Takes two minutes.

settings.heading: What's the difference between courier and walk-in?
settings.sub_head: Courier means we collect from your door anywhere in the UK. Walk-in means you drop off at our London office. Same repair quality, same warranty, same turnaround.

settings.heading: How long does a repair take?
settings.sub_head: Most repairs take 1 to 3 working days. Simple fixes like screen or battery can be same day if pre-booked. Complex work like liquid damage or logic board repair takes 2 to 5 days depending on what we find.

settings.heading: Do I need to back up my device first?
settings.sub_head: We recommend it, but it's not required. We never wipe devices and always prioritise keeping your data intact. If backup isn't possible due to the fault, we'll discuss options.

settings.heading: What happens if you find additional problems?
settings.sub_head: We stop and contact you before doing anything extra. You'll get a clear explanation and updated quote. Nothing proceeds without your approval.

settings.heading: Can I track my courier repair?
settings.sub_head: Yes. You'll get tracking for collection and return delivery, plus updates from us when it arrives, when diagnostics are done, and when repair is complete.

settings.heading: Is there an express option?
settings.sub_head: Yes. Express repairs are available for most issues if booked in advance. Subject to availability. Contact us to check.

settings.heading: What areas do you cover for courier collection?
settings.sub_head: All of mainland UK. Collection is typically same day or next day depending on your location and booking time.

settings.heading: FAQs
settings.details: Learn more about iCorrect, the essential repair services that we offer and the warranties that come with each repair.
